sentences.sContent: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.sContent_eng: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.sCn: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.sContent: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.sContent_eng: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.sCn: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

words.tran: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的

trans.tranOther: the study of ancient societies by examining what remains of their buildings,  grave s  , tools etc
